abstract add(*, site: AbstractContainer, mujoco_object_blueprint: MujocoObject, validators: list[peters_algorithm.base.asset_placement.validator.Validator])[source]¶

Adds a mujoco object to a site by calling the sites add method. Possibly checks placement via the validator.

Parameters:

  • site (AbstractContainer) – Site class instance where the object is added to

  • mujoco_object_blueprint (MujocoObject) – To-be-placed mujoco object

  • validators (list) – List of validator class instances used to check object placement

abstract remove(*, site: AbstractContainer, mujoco_object: MujocoObject)[source]¶

Removes a mujoco object from a site by calling the sites remove method. Possibly checks placement via the validator.

Parameters:

  • site (AbstractContainer) – Site class instance where the object is removed from

  • mujoco_object (MujocoObject) – To-be-removed mujoco object

Returns:

Site class instance where the object is added to (with removed mjcf-obj)

Return type:

site (AbstractContainer)
